name: Paradigm (itch) (laneg17)
description:
This was created for a class at Niagara College. My team was one of six chosen to go to GD Launch (their annual showcase). 

A prisoner encounters a strange object that allows him to teleport between two dimensions. Take advantage of this ability to solve mind bending puzzles.

Controls:

WASD/Left Stick - Movement

Space/A - Jump

E, Left Click/X - Pick up/Interact

Shift, S/Right Trigger - Swap Dimensions
